name: Control Point Drift
description:
We tried to combine the genres of racing and base capturing. We were going for tower defense, but as with all game jams, our united mortal enemy, time, was not on our side. 

In this game, two players race to capture the maximum number of bases they can, by drifting their car around it.

The captured base will aim and fire bullets at the opponent, but be careful not to be in the path as that may hit you instead. The one with the most bases at the end of the timer wins the round.

NOTE: BOTH PLAYERS WOULD BE PLAYING ON THE SAME COMPUTER SYSTEM.
